text: Campodorus elegans is a species of parasitic wasps in the tribe Mesoleiini. It is found in England. The species was transferred from Mesoleius by Shaw and Kasparyan in 2003.Some genera of British and European Mesoleiini (Hym., Ichneumonidae: Ctenopelmatinae) in the National Museums of Scotland, including a new species of … MR Shaw, DR Kasparyan - ENTOMOLOGISTS MONTHLY MAGAZINE, 2003 == References == == External links == * Category:Ctenopelmatinae Category:Insects described in 1882 Category:Fauna of England
title: Campodorus elegans
